headline: Ford Motor’s EV Layoffs and Strategy Shift Could Be a Game Changer for Ford (F)
summary: Earlier this month, Ford Motor Company announced plans to lay off 1,000 workers in Germany as part of a wider reduction of 2,900 jobs, citing slower-than-expected electric vehicle demand and efforts to contain losses in its EV business segment. This move marks a shift as Ford pulls back from its EV ambitions at a time when other automakers are increasing investments to capture electric vehicle market share. We’ll examine how Ford’s workforce reductions and shifting EV priorities could...
